thread.title: TONNETTE JOHNSON
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by TONNETTE JOHNSON

author: TONNETTE JOHNSON
title: TONNETTE JOHNSON
text: I placed my order online from Maryland for my son who was in Texas working at the time. The furniture was for his new apartment in Florida. Wow! Everything went so smoothly with the delivery and the great customer service. Awesome Job Everyone
